name: Planetary Exploration Company (itch)
description:
You are the leader of a Space Exploration Company, your job is to explore planets
and deliver resources to their colonial bases.

When you explore the planet you can find proceduraly generated creatures, minerals, vegetals and artifacts. Then you have to use the right tools to extract resources from them.

You can create and upgrade tools for your employees, combine resources, research new technologies and upgrade your transport robot with new rooms that give you new abilities.

----------------------Important: This is an early prototype and many of the ideas here are not implemented yet. It cannot be played from start to finish, but you can see some if its ideas working

Please let me know if you have any request or idea you would like to see in the game, I'll keep updating the game every week.
